abstract: I downloaded all my vacation photos to Google’s Picasa, but I am having trouble finding information on how to use it. There doesn’t seem to be a “Dummies” book.
snippet: I downloaded all my vacation photos to Google’s Picasa, but I am having trouble finding information on how to use it. There doesn’t seem to be a “Dummies” book.
lead_paragraph: Q. I downloaded all my vacation photos to Google’s Picasa, but I am having trouble finding information on how to use it. Google sends you to a chat room with other confused users. Any ideas where to look? There doesn’t seem to be a “Dummies” book.

abstract: The incoming chief executive of eBay, John Donahoe, says he is planning a new search engine to show users the best offers from the best sellers with low prices, fast shipping and high quality. He’s also prepared for a wave of protest from sellers whose listings are not featured in the new search results.
snippet: The incoming chief executive of eBay, John Donahoe, says he is planning a new search engine to show users the best offers from the best sellers with low prices, fast shipping and high quality. He’s also prepared for a wave of protest from sellers ...
lead_paragraph: How will eBay fend off the growing challenge from Google?

headline.main: John Donahoe’s Plan to Save eBay: Better Search
